attributes.additional_details: A fairer way to gain funding from the public who wish to support or watch BBC channels / BBC iPlayer, record programmes etc. is to subscribe, like many do to channels such as Netflix or Amazon Prime. This is fairer because there is NO ANNUAL FEE or tie in, just a monthly subscription that can be cancelled when convenient for the 'Customer' the Subscriber.
attributes.background: I and many others do not watch any of the BBC channels. We find it unfair to pay a licence to the BBC when we do not like, agree or support them.
